desc:
MK1 Enuos Japanese Import 1990 Partially restored with Spares and running driving Donor car -¬£2500 Car had been off the road since 2013 - I have a large folder where I've kept every receipt documenting everything that I've bought and done in the last 6 months here is what I can currently recall;... - New wind screen -New Calipers (sprayed red), ECB Pads, Shocks (Springs Struts bump-stops) and toyo tyres all round- -New exhaust, Second hand decent roof installed, sound proofing installed - New Bluetooth/ internal memory stereo installed -Oils changed (transmission Engine Diff) -Wheels aligned, new battery, installed handy USB charger in cubby area (green to match interior lighting), -New temp sensor- panels swapped in allowing hard top fitment- windows dismantled (including switches) lubricated (silicone) etc
Things Id recommend doing to complete restoration; fully body Respray paint work had metal filings dumped on it at some point- Underseal - swap in LSD /better rear sub frame from red car (current diff wines but comes with 3 spare diffs and diff oil!), The new exhaust is from the old cat back ( had to keep cat for Manx test) it was only meant to be temporary as it didn't quite line up with the Cat- small leak I've patched it with exhaust putty but ideally it would have a cobalt exhaust
Comes with loads of spares and a whole other MX5 that runs and drives (crash damage to door/side body)- I also have a load of photos of the work being done. Its Taxed and tested and ready for summer great to drive as is, i'll miss it. Call or text Arthur on 433180 or fb message I would be willing to split up the cars up if someone wants the donor for demo derby or something
title: MK1 Enuos Japanese Import 1990 Partially restored +donor
